channel.title: Can someone give me a link to this type of server please?
channel.description: So i'm looking for a server that can have all players spawn items,has to be like a 317 revision type or a bit higher with some 718 items but not too high graphiced. I want to code that type of server to start making my own rsps. If anyone can give me a link to where a server like tis is located.I would be grateful.THX! :)

item.title: Can someone give me a link to this type of server please?
item.dc:creator: @Noobinator9907 Noobinator9907
item.description:
@Noobinator9907 wrote:

Most all 317’s have that capability, go in to the Commands.java (This is if you’re using a PI) and search this

Then copy the entire code and move it under this

public void playerCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) {

Make sure you delete the previous line after moving it and always make a backup of the original file.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone give me a link to this type of server please?
